magibit.InfraredSensorReadValue|block: 👀巡线传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.MotorSpeedSensorReadValue|block: ⏱测速传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.SoilSensorReadValue|block: 💧土壤湿度传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.SoundSensorReadValue|block: 🔊声音传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.UltrasonicReadValue|block: 📡超声波(cm)传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.airHumidityReadValue|block: 🌡空气湿度（%） 传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.airTemperatureReadValue|block: 🌡空气温度（℃） 传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.lightSensorReadValue|block: 🔆光线强度传感器模块数据输出在 |%pin|
magibit.motorSetSpeed|block: 电机 |%motor| 方向 |%direction| 速度 |%speed|
magibit.potentiometerReadValue|block: 🎚电位器旋转位置的数据输出在 |%pin|
